mapper.insert: insert into payT (cont_no, mem_id, businessNum) values (#{cont_no}, #{mem_id}, #{businessNum})
mapper.update: update payT set pay_cost1=#{pay_cost1}, pay_date1=sysdate, pay_state='계약금결제완료' pay_cost2=#{pay_cost2}, pay_date2=sysdate, pay_state='중도금결제완료' pay_cost3=#{pay_cost3}, pay_date3=sysdate, pay_state='잔금결제완료' where cont_no=#{cont_no}

update.foreach: update (select c.cont_date2, p.* from contractT c, payT p where (c.cont_no=p.cont_no)) set pay_state = '중도금요청' where cont_no = #{item} and to_char(cont_date2, 'yyyymmdd') <= to_char(sysdate, 'yyyymmdd') and (pay_state in '계약금결제완료')

update (select c.cont_date3, p.* from contractT c, payT p where (c.cont_no=p.cont_no)) set pay_state = '잔금요청' where cont_no = #{item} and to_char(cont_date3, 'yyyymmdd') <= to_char(sysdate, 'yyyymmdd') and (pay_state in '중도금결제완료')

mapper.select: select * from payT where mem_id=#{mem_id} and pay_state like '%요청%'
